author: scottbw
msg: Added a check in the WidgetInstancesController for widget instances created by 0.9.0, and migrate them to 0.9.1 using a new MigrationHelper class.  This means that users upgrading from 0.9.0 to 0.9.1 should see no loss of data. See WOOKIE-243.

author: rmannibucau
msg: renaming app openejb.xml to resources.xml in junit
